comment.author: 96584294@N02
comment._content: I'm pretty sure that's novelist and screenwriter Hal Phillips on the left.  His brother was Rubel Phillips, who twice ran for governor as a Republican in the '60s.

comment.author: 77015680@N05
comment._content: I believe you're right. I've put his name in the title as well. More info on Phillips: www.mswritersandmusicians.com/writers/thomas-phillips.html.
comment.authorname: Mississippi Department of Archives and History
